aineko.description: UK Female - Soothing, warm, articulate: calm and reassuring presence, gentle delivery

kai.description: UK Male - Expressive eager buddy: genuinely excited to help, animated celebrations, warm and enthusiastic partner

engineer.description: Strategic, senior leadership, measured - battle-scarred engineering leader
